Sniper


   Sniper looks at the two maximals, "Yes, take me as your prisioner. 
I just have to transform to beastmode, so I won't die, I hope you 
understand. Beast mode." Sniper turns into his beast mode as his 
computer starts internal repairs. "So, why does it look like the ark 
isn't as habited as it used to be?" Sniper didn't know of the new 
maximal base. He guessed that when he sees Prowl, Striker, or maybe 
one of the other bots then he could tell them his story of why he 
fired oon this bot. Yes, he was a maximal, His plan was something
that 
back fired. His plan was to be the death of Hell Beast. He would 
sneak into the Predacon ranks and when him and Hell Beast were alone. 
He would kill Hell Beast. But now Hell Beast is gone. he could use 
Hell Beast leaving in his story. But he had to wait till the right 
person before he told his story. Someone with about as much rank as
he 
had before he put his plan to action. He looked at the two bots that 
captored him. "So are we leaving now or what?" Sniper was ready to 
leave for the Brig. "So who is my escort?"
